name: "Days of Ancient and Modern part 003" (After Blake)
description:
This work has been created in response to the Whitworth Gallery's experimental approach towards researching alternative economic support structures for cultural and community funding (Manchester UK).

It is generated from a screenshot of "The Ancient of Days NFT" (objkt#168856) based on William Blake’s “The Ancient of Days”.

7 editions of this work are donated to the Museum with permission to sell, hodl or burn at their discretion.

Medium:
Data-bent .png file, re-animated and manually glitched with keystrokes, presented as animated Gif, 1313x988px 
Composition by James Alec Hardy 2021
